name: The Mercenaries
description:
### **The Mercenaries**

With the Terran and the Protoss military force greatly demise from previous conflicts many of their colony have to rely on a more private company for protection. The Mercenary. Among many mercenary company there is one that is considered to be the black sheep of the family, for when other mercenary work for highest bidder they work for what they believe is the right thing to do. They are the Mercenary Company number 452, also know as Knight Wings. This is their story.

### **Mission List**

#### **Mission 1 A: Pradera De Ceniza - Pilot (Release)**

- This is Pilot map/mission, a remake of [**njordys**](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/njordysevac/>) Bio Tech 3rd map. Also have cameos of Janus Ora and Sgt. Henderson, the heroes from [**EivindL**](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/amber-sun/>) Crimson Moon and Amber Sun Campaign. 
- Require Hearts of the Swarm 



#### **Mission 1 B: Pradera De Ceniza - Origins (Under Construction)**

- The complete map of Pradera De Ceniza, explain Tea Bone's and Keish Ar's origins. 
- Require Hearts of the Swarm 



#### **Mission 2 : Revelation (Release)**

- While waiting for Legacy of the Void decided to make a protoss hero as a member of the Mercenaries. Expect lots of cutscene and 'blinking'. Complete and Release without HotS assets on WoL (already triple check to make sure). 
- Require Wings of Liberty 



#### **Mission 3 : Liberation (Release)**

- I think Nova deserve more, so this map dedicated to her. Expect lots of 'cloaking' here. Complete and Release without HotS assets on WoL (already triple check to make sure). 
- Require Wings of Liberty 



#### **Mission 4 : Reservation (Release)**

- Trying to create a Primal Zerg hero as member of the mercenaries. Expect lots of cutscene and 'rescuing' here. 
- Require Hearts of the Swarm 



#### **Mission 5 : Confrontation (Under Construction)**

- The hunt for Ben Ar's lost memories ends here. Help the Knight Wings survive their strongest enemy. 
- The gathering of heroes!. 
- Require Hearts of the Swarm 



#### **Mission 6 : Conviction (Planning)**

- Last map of the campaign, the Knight Wings prove their worth against waves of veteran mercenaries. 
- The gathering of heroes!. 
- Require Hearts of the Swarm 



### **How to Play**

Download the file, open it with SC2 editor and press "test map."

- Requirement is different for each map. 
- Don't forget to turn subtitle on. 
- Don't forget to turn the TIPS on. 



### **Screenshots**

[ScreenShots](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/mercenaries/images/>)

### **Forum Feedback**

[Forum Feedback](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/forums/player-zone/map-feedback/53981-the-mercenaries/#p1>)

### **Credits**

- [EivindL](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/amber-sun/>) \- For allowing me to make cameos of his heroes. 
- [Ghostnova91](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/assets/ghostnovas-mods/files/42-starcraft-1-ghost/>) \- For starcraft 1 ghost model. 
- [Cacho56](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/forums/development/editor-bugs-and-feedback/54284-text-bugs/#p14>) \- For 'how to fix param bugs'. 
- [Salirth and AegisRunestone](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/assets/psihydr-model/>) \- For psionic hydralisk model. 
- [Thrikodias and Forsworne](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/assets/dark-protoss/files/138-lynx-close-combat-suit/>) \- For Kamen Kaiser model (Lnyx close combat suit). 
- [Don't know his name can't read korean](</linkout?remoteUrl=http%253a%252f%252fcafe.naver.com%252fstar2model.cafe%253fiframe_url%253d%252fArticleRead.nhn%253fclubid%253d20504597%2526menuid%253d21%2526boardtype%253dI%2526page%253d8%2526specialmenutype%253d%2526articleid%253d424%2526referrerAllArticles%253dfalse>) \- For Metal Man (Iron Marine) model. 
- [Wulfrein](</linkout?remoteUrl=http%253a%252f%252fxgm.ru%252fp%252fsc2%252fsc2reiter>) \- For Goldorack (Protoss Reiter) model. 
- [Flinkelinks](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/assets/flinks-icon-pack/>) \- For custom icons. 
- [SoulFilcher](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/assets/abilities-and-upgrades-icon-pack/>) \- For custom icons. 
- Blizzard - for making such a great game.
author: edhriano
